text: This is a really wonderful and convenient little shop. The boss was very friendly, cheerful and helpful. They have a large variety of items, ranging from household cleaning items, packaged foodstuffs, fresh vegetables and also meats. They have a large variety of snacks, and they also sell traditional "biskut tin" by weight. Such a great little mini mart in the community

Special Price just for you.

Bag of ice as big as your pillow for RM4.50.

Great for office parties and home gathering. Big value compared to 7-11 price and size. Cordial syrup also available. Front door priority parking available now.
It's so cheap, I can't think of the best store, for those of you who live in the region, it's best to buy here
There are a lot of things, and they open at 7.30. Itâ€™s rare to see a small shop open so early. Thumbs up!
